[quote=“Null Amount, post:2, topic:538589”] /* * Insert whatever checks that you're killing your task. */ slayerTaskAmount--; //Whatever you use to decrement the task amount. if (slayerTaskAmount == 0) { //If the task amount is zero, then the task is completed. addItem(tokenId, amount); //Use whatever method that PI uses to add items to a players inventory or whatever you want to do. }[/quote]

i wont know where to put man, can you give me a hint?
